body_html:
@krikru if you want to know what exactly is coming from conda, look at the conda listings and you can cross-reference with the github tags. For example, conda search -c peterjc123 -f pytorch.

  • https://anaconda.org/pytorch
  • https://anaconda.org/soumith
  • https://anaconda.org/peterjc123
  • https://anaconda.org/anaconda/pytorch

@djangoma why do you need 0.2 on windows? There should be plenty of posts about how to upgrade your code and you can just run on current pytorch. If you really need 0.2 on windows, you can use either docker or WSL but you wouldn't get GPU support.
